description:
The real feel of New York City this is the perfect way to describe my beautiful fully renovated comfortable 2BR apartment. 
Bright and clean, high ceilings, chic expose Brick walls, 45" flat screen TV's in every room connected to Netflix for free use. 
you will love my place because of the beautiful neighborhood, the ambiance and the fantastic location near lots of attractions you must visit. 
Subway 2,3,C,B is around the corner.
Great for couples, families, business travelers.
name: Beautiful Central Park 2BR Apt
review: L'appartement est exactement comme sur les photos. Il Est à 2 pas de Central Parc et est très bien desservi par les métros. Matt est très serviable et vous donne pleins d'infos. Bref des vacances géniales dans un appart  typiquement New Yorkais.
